data.text: Kiken xi mɔxɔɲɛde lɔxɔni, Isirayila kaane yi e malan, e sun, e kasa bɛnbɛli dugine ragodo e ma, e burunburunna sa e xunne yi sunu taxamasenne ra.
Naxanye yi findixi Isirayila kaane ra, ne yi e masiga xɔɲɛne ra, e yi e ti e yulubine ra e nun e benbane gbeene.
E to keli, e ti, e yi Alatala, e Alaa sariya kɛdin xaran waxati xunkuye. Yanyin na, e yi e xinbi sin Alatala yɛtagi, e Ala, e mɔn yi e ti e yulubine ra han waxati xunkuye.
Lewi bɔnsɔnna muxuna ndee yi keli, e te gbingbinna fari, Yosuwe nun Bani nun Kadamile nun Sɛbaniha nun Bunni nun Serebi nun Bani nun Kenani. Ne yi e xuini te Alatala ma, e Ala.
Lewi bɔnsɔnna muxune, Yosuwe nun Kadamile nun Bani nun Xasabaneya nun Serebi nun Hodiya nun Sɛbaniha nun Petaxi yi a fala, e naxa, “Ɛ keli, en Alatala, en ma Ala tantun habadan han habadan!”
I tan nan keden pe Alatala ra,
I tan Marigina Alatala,
I yi a to a dɛnkɛlɛyaxi i ma a bɔɲɛni,
“I nxu benbane ɲaxankatan to nɛn Misiran yi,
I yi taxamasenne nun kabanako feene yita Firawona
I yi baa igeni taxun e yɛɛ ra,
I yi kundaan ti e yɛɛ ra yanyin na,
I godo nɛn keli kore,
Fata i ya walikɛɛn Musa ra,
Kamɛn to e suxu,
Koni nxu benbane murutɛ nɛn wasoni,
E mi tin e suxɛ,
E yi ɲinge di sawura wure daxin nafala e yɛtɛ xa,
Koni i ya kininkinin gbeeni,
I yi i ya Nii faɲin naso e yi
I yi i yengi dɔxɔ e xɔn ma
I yamanane nun siyane so nɛn e yii,
I yi e diine rawuya ayi
E yixɛtɛne yi so mɛnni,
E yi taa makantanxine tongo
“Koni, e keli nɛn
Nayi, i yi e sa e yaxune sagoni,
Koni, e xɔrɔyaan sɔtɔ nɛn tun,
I yi e mabandun i ya sariyan ma,
I ti nɛn e bun ma ɲɛɛ wuyaxi,
I ya kininkinin gbeeni,
“Iki, nxɔ Ala, Ala gbeena,
Feen naxanye birin nxu sɔtɔxi,
Nxɔ mangane nun nxɔ kuntigine
E yi e yamanani
To, nxu bata findi konyine ra yamanani
A seene bata findi mangane gbeene ra
